revised_title: Discovery of Rhodium and Confirmation of Palladium as a Simple Metal
tldr: Dr. Wollaston discovered a new metal, Rhodium, found in crude Platina. He also confirmed that Palladium, previously announced as a compound, is actually a simple metal present in small proportions in Platina ore. Rhodium and Palladium are both valuable additions to the field of metallurgy.
